heading: HR00933
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE EXCLUSION OF TEACHERS AND EDUCATION SUPPORT PERSONNEL IN PRIVATE ELEMENTARY AND HIGH SCHOOLS AND HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT COVID-19 AUGMENTATION MEASURES PROGRAM, THEREBY FAILING TO SWIFTLY AID THIS SUBSECTOR OF WORKERS IN COPING WITH THE COVID-19 CRISIS
principal-authors: CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; GAITE, FERDINAND R.; CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-06-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00933
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE EXCLUSION OF TEACHERS AND EDUCATION SUPPORT PERSONNEL IN PRIVATE ELEMENTARY AND HIGH SCHOOLS AND HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT COVID-19 AUGMENTATION MEASURES PROGRAM, THEREBY FAILING TO SWIFTLY AID THIS SUBSECTOR OF WORKERS IN COPING WITH THE COVID-19 CRISIS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTRO, FRANCE L., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., GAITE, FERDINAND R., CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C., BROSAS, ARLENE D., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.

REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2020-06-02
